data.title: Die 10 besten Hotels in der Nähe von Primark in Enschede – Bewertungen, Fotos und Karten
meta_keywords: Hotels in der Nähe von Primark
data.meta_description: Günstige und beliebte Hotels in der Nähe von Primark in Enschede mit echten Gästebewertungen suchen. Buche die besten Hotelangebote, um ganz in der Nähe von Primark zu übernachten und dabei den garantiert niedrigsten Preis bei Trip.com zu buchen!
data.text:
A stay at IntercityHotel Enschede places you in the heart of Enschede, within a 10-minute walk of Grote Kerk and Naturemuseum Enschede. This 4-star hotel is 1.4 mi (2.3 km) from Rijksmuseum Twente and 1.5 mi (2.4 km) from Stadhuis. Enjoy recreation amenities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a terrace. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and a vending machine. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 11 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 126 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Mehr anzeigen

Taste the atmosphere at the Hotel Restaurant Rodenbach and enjoy the combination of stylish accommodation, culinary pleasure and unique location in the green heart of the city. Behind this hotel’s classic exterior you will find a decor that combines modern style with characteristic features to create a timeless elegance. It is a 10-minutes' walking from the city centre of Enschede and right next to the wonderful urban park of Volkspark. The refined restaurant of the Rodenbach provides a pleasant environment for your lunch and dinner. The delicious cuisine served in the warm ambience of this place ensures that every meal becomes a gourmet experience. With free private parking and a Wi-Fi connection available throughout the residence (charges applicable), you will have all the convenience you need for a relaxing break. The Wilminktheater is within 1 km from the hotel. The Hotel Rodenbach offers a variety of tasteful guest rooms. All rooms are furnished in a modern style and equipped with various facilities and conveniences. With your own desk, telephone and private bathroom you will have all the comforts of home. There is also an optional W-Fi connection available in the rooms. For a culinary evening you can go to the stylish restaurant of Rodenbach, where you can indulge in a relaxed atmosphere. The Rodenbach is primarily an à la carte restaurant with 120 seats. Because of the excellent cuisine served in the Rodenbach, this place is known for its high quality. The restaurant is modern and tastefully furnished, ideal for a culinary evening. Enjoy your aperitif at the bar or in our comfortable chairs near the fireplace before you go to your table. Herenkamer This cosy room is ideal for smaller groups (up to 18 people). This room is appropriate for private dinners and because of the extensive meeting facilities, this area is also ideally suited for meetings.

Mehr anzeigen

Situated on the peaceful, green campus of the University of Twente, right in between the lively cities of Hengelo and Enschede, you will find this convenient hotel. In addition to practical accommodation, you can benefit from free parking facilities and free Wi-Fi internet in the entire hotel. With an exceptional amount of single rooms, Conferentiehotel Drienerburght is ideal for solo travellers or people who prefer their privacy when travelling with others. Enjoy the hotel’s warm atmosphere and take advantage of the excellent transport links with buses and via the train station Drienerlo to explore the area. Go for a walk on the wonderful campus; cycle in the environment; or sit out with a drink on the terrace. The a la carte restaurant of the University is situated within walking distance. A small menu is available in the hotelbar.

Mehr anzeigen

With a stay at U Parkhotel in Enschede, you'll be steps from University of Twente and a 4-minute drive from Grolsch Veste. This upscale hotel is 2.6 mi (4.1 km) from Driene Golf and 2.7 mi (4.3 km) from Naturemuseum Enschede. Enjoy recreational amenities such as a 24-hour fitness center and bicycles to rent. Satisfy your appetite at Restaurant, a restaurant which features a bar/lounge. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 9:30 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include express check-out, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and 13 meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 72 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. 32-inch flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Mehr anzeigen

Located in Enschede, Huize Hölterhof is within a 10-minute drive of Naturemuseum Enschede and Stadhuis. This spa hotel is 3.5 mi (5.6 km) from Grote Kerk and 3.8 mi (6.1 km) from Rijksmuseum Twente. Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find hot springs, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access and a picnic area. Stop by the hotel's restaurant, Bistro Holterhof, for lunch or dinner. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe, and room service (during limited hours) is provided. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are served on weekdays from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM and on weekends from 8:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include luggage storage, a library, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 17 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries.

Mehr anzeigen

With a stay at Fletcher Hotel-Restaurant De Broeierd in Enschede, you'll be a 3-minute walk from University of Twente and 13 minutes by foot from Grolsch Veste. This upscale hotel is 2.3 mi (3.8 km) from Driene Golf and 2.8 mi (4.5 km) from Naturemuseum Enschede. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, a hair salon, and tour/ticket assistance. Grab a bite at Restaurant De Broeierd, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite. Stay in one of 61 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Mehr anzeigen

When you stay at Frans op den Bult in Deurningen, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Historisch Museum Hengelo and Driene Golf. This hotel is 4.1 mi (6.6 km) from Fanny Blankers-Koen Stadion and 5 mi (8 km) from De Waarbeek Amusement Park. Enjoy recreation amenities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a terrace. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a vending machine. At Frans op den Bult, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee. Featured amenities include a business center, multilingual staff, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and 7 meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 57 air-conditioned rooms featuring DVD players. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Mehr anzeigen

Located in Delden, Landgoed Hotel & Restaurant Carelshaven is in a rural location, a 1-minute drive from No Hero Museum and 6 minutes from Twickel Castle. This upscale hotel is 3.2 mi (5.2 km) from Historisch Museum Hengelo and 4.1 mi (6.7 km) from Fanny Blankers-Koen Stadion. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and wedding services. Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the hotel's restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Full breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Delden? This hotel has 4853 square feet (451 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and 3 meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite. Stay in one of 20 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Mehr anzeigen

Located in De Lutte, Landhuishotel & Restaurant De Bloemenbeek is in a rural location, within a 15-minute drive of Huize Keizer Museum and Landgoed Singraven. This upscale hotel is 5.4 mi (8.6 km) from 't Goor Park and 10 mi (16 km) from Rijksmuseum Twente. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. While the golfer in the family is out on the course, you can enjoy above-par recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access, a hair salon, and shopping on site. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge). Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served on weekdays from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM. Featured amenities include complimentary wired internet access, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in De Lutte? This hotel has 4306 square feet (400 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and 8 meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 57 guestrooms featuring minibars and Smart televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers.
